title: Istanbul City: three books
description:
1)  Boyar (Cambridge University Press)   Social History of Istanbul (up to 1900).


2)  Gul (2009) Emergence of modern Istanbul.


3)  Orhan Pamuk  Istanbul , memories and the city.



------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTES:



on (2): is an architecture-urbanism book , mostly dealing with XX century.

on (3): is good to remember than the nobel prize had in his youth the 

          wish to become an architect , thus developing a fine eye for architecture

          and landscape. This makes the book a litte jewel for those loving the 

          "eastern Paris".
